short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your shopping rewards in a single click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make the most out of every single transaction you make with your credit cards. thrift helps you identify the best credit card with maximum rewards in a single click.

Missing out on optimal rewards is no longer a pain and we help you get utmost gain. We help provide information across thousands of online retailers which means you earn more rewards on your regular online shopping effort!

Our algorithm works based on the data we have crowdsourced and proprietary matching strategy of retailers with the best card. Although this is purely based on each merchant category code which might change anytime of the year, we strive to make the predictions as accurate as possible.

We DON'T collect any anonymous or personal data.
